sent.orig: The client shops to pursue not only a reasonable price, pursue even a convenient, save trouble.
sent.trans: 顾客买东西不仅图个合理的价格，还要图个方便、省事等。

sent.orig: Pursue only what you can and should acquire. Never pursue what you can't and shouldn't acquire.
sent.trans: 能要、该要的才要；不能要，不该要的绝对不要。

sent.orig: So they continue to pursue and pursue until they find they want.
sent.trans: 于是，他们从不停止追求直到找到他们渴求的。

sent.orig: When a subject has been turned down, only a tactless person would pursue it.
sent.trans: 当对方已拒谈某个话题时，只有不上道的人才会追着这个话题谈下去。

sent.orig: We pursue a policy of goodwill in international relations.
sent.trans: 我们在处理国际关系中遵循亲善友好的政策。
